tool_description: Summarize any URL or text using state-of-the-art abstractive and extractive summarization models.
name: TLDRThis
title: TLDRThis

api_list.name: Human-like Article Summarization
api_list.description: Use one of the world's most advanced abstractive summarization models to extract the most important sentences from a given article URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tldrthis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/model/abstractive/summarize-url/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tldrthis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
